oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Illinois Monument, Missionary Ridge, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of the Illinois Monument located on the Bragg Reservation along Missionary Ridge in Chattanooga. Features a white border, divided back, and narrative on reverse. Also on reverse is handwritten correspondence and an August 30, 1928 postmark. [No. 13]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Monuments & memorials; Roads; Aerial photographs
